content: {"name": "Philadelphia's MANNA", "alternate_name": "", "description": "MANNA serves all ages and provides a frozen meal service for people with serious medical conditions with nutritional concerns. There are two easy ways to apply for MANNA\u2019s services: A medical professional can complete a MANNA Referral Form and fax it to our Nutrition & Client Services department at (215) 496-9102. Or call (215) 496-2662 x5. Our Nutrition & Client Services team will assist you and coordinate with your healthcare provider to complete the required referral form.", "email": "", "url": "https://mannapa.org/services/apply-for-manna-services/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}]}
